title: SWITCH IT UP | ZWITCH 1T UP
lyrics:
That nigga nice, that nigga mean, switch it up
That nigga raw, that nigga green, switch it up
That nigga lost, he in the lead, switch it up
I'ma get money by any means, run it up
Uh huh, to be, or not to be?

Havin' 'em lit, if it ain't homicide I don't commit

Y'all throw a fit when you don't got a fit

If you put out a hit, bet you the killer ain't gon' make a cent

Bitch, it's a Miami nigga no Moonlight

Let's take it back to the crib

One of my homies, he pull the gun on me

He turnin' cold on me like meet the maker

So super phony as if he don't know me

I see what they told me about the hater

And I wasn't even phased, been the hottest in the place

Talkin' 'bout a nigga changed with a pocket full of change

Range, this order, blame this for the pain in Florida

Bipolar, vibe over, time slower I'm sober, now I sorta see

What is going on with me? (huh) Gotta shout-out homie G

You did wrong, but it's done for the right, new friends, new flies

They swarm to the light, money and a new girl

That's warm for the night

Do a hoe like clothes they wore for the night like



That nigga nice, that nigga mean, switch it up

That nigga raw, that nigga green, switch it up

That nigga lost, hittin' the lean, switch it up

I'ma get money by any means, run it up



Uh huh, how can I see through my lenses

When I can't see who my friend is, huh?

Wanna be down as dependent, would you give up your appendix?

If life is hangin' by a thread, then a nigga just might be dead

If my life was in your hands, now a nigga don't trust no man

Maybe I shoulda been shot on the day that it happened

When you started snappin' on me

They only seen what's on the one side

It's deeper than rap nigga and a nigga move back to the 3

Get back to it with the boys in my hood 'cause it ain't no [?] no other

I got new niggas tellin' these new niggas that I don't fuck with my brother

They only know Denzel Curry, but they really don't know Denzel

Everybody wanna ride waves and jump when the ship don't sail

You did wrong, not done for the right

New friends, new flies, you flew to the life

Funny what these new niggas might do for the hype

Lesson learned, I'm goin' on through with ya life like



That nigga nice, that nigga mean, switch it up

That nigga raw, that nigga green, switch it up

That nigga lost, hittin' the lean, switch it up

I'ma get money by any means, run it up

That nigga nice, that nigga mean, switch it up

That nigga raw, that nigga green, switch it up

That nigga lost, hittin' the lean, switch it up

I'ma get money by any means, run it up
